Comments_List: I learned how to be accountable for my own time and work independently.
I gained skills in forming original research hypotheses, computational neuroimaging methods, and troubleshooting roadblocks in the research process.
Weakness: Not quite sure what the head professors wanted out of us for final papers and presentations. Expectations were unclear or ambiguous.
As this is an independent project rather than a formal course, there were no systematic strengths and weaknesses.
If you are a neuroscience major, you should do an empirical research project for your senior requirement! Its challenging but youll learn a lot and accomplish something cool.
